1.code:
epsilon = sqrt(finfo(float).eps)


def plogdet(K):
    r"""Log of the pseudo-determinant.
    It assumes that ``K`` is a positive semi-definite matrix.
    Args:
        K (array_like): matrix.
    Returns:
        float: log of the pseudo-determinant.
    """
    egvals = eigvalsh(K)
    return npsum(log(egvals[egvals > epsilon]))
